context_bundle.summary: IPC (Inter-Process Communication) methods: Named Pipes (Windows/Linux, bidirectional streams), Sockets (TCP/UDP, network-capable), Shared Memory (fastest, complex sync), Message Queues (async, buffered), Files (simple, PhiSync pattern), Signals (Unix, event notification). Choose based on: platform, performance, complexity.

onboarding.quick_start: IPC methods: Named Pipes (\\.\\pipe\\name on Windows, /tmp/*.pipe on Linux), Sockets (TCP for reliable, UDP for fast), Shared Memory (mmap, fastest but complex locking), Message Queues (POSIX, async), Files (PhiSync file-based IPC), Signals (SIGUSR1/2). Trade-offs: speed vs complexity vs platform support.
